Author: puppetcreature
Text: If you get tons of canned veggies/pickled veggies you can keep your food cost really low. Rice/potatoes/oats/lentils and beans are quite cheap in general and fill you up a lot imo. Also frozen veggies and always look at the clearance section to look for food you were wanting to buy anyway! I'm vegan and I usually spend below 100â‚¬ a month for food.
